subject: Simsonn HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter
description_text:
Hello is the message: "This product is available for pre-sale. Shipping
will commence on December 19th." Meaning that it will start at the end of
year 2026 or is it an old note?
Thanks in advance

conversations.body_text: Hi Gytis Apanavičius,  We have resumed normal shipments. We will update and correct the previous notice, and thank you for your feedback.
